content: **freya fingerless gloves** ======================================= these easy fingerless mittens are sure to become your go-to fall accessory the pattern is written for seven sizes from toddler to adult xl ensuring a perfect cozy fit for all hands to fit hand circumference* toddler 5 5 / 14cm child 6 / 15cm tween 6 5 / 16 5cm adult s 7 / 18cm adult m 7 5 / 19cm adult l 8 / 20 5cm adult xl 9 / 23cm ** hand circumference measurement should be taken around the widest part of the hand but excluding the thumb * **materials** yarn per pair alpaca cloud dk toddler 75yds / 69m child 85yds / 78m tween 110yds / 101m s 135yds / 123m m 165yds / 151m l 200yds / 183m xl 220yds / 201m hook 4 5mm us 7 crochet hook or hook required to meet gauge --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2023 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
